Gaithersburg.Mother of God School: Mother of God School (MOG) is a Catholic, coeducational private school located in Gaithersburg, Maryland. The school currently enrolls students in pre-kindergarten through 8th grade. It is affiliated with the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Washington and the Mother of God Community (formerly known as the Potomac Charismatic Community, Inc), which was responsible for the school's founding.
